function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of greenery in built environments","Impact":"Increased stress and mental fatigue, reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Introducing vegetation into courtyards and immediate vicinity, increasing greenery in existing and new buildings","Technologies":"Green roofs, walls, common gardens","People":"Residents, office workers, hospitalized patients","Owner":"Building owners, city planners, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Limited access to greenery during confinement","Impact":"Reduced well-being and health of residents","Mitigation":"Increasing greenery within existing and new buildings, measuring and improving green infrastructures","Technologies":"Green roofs, walls, common gardens","People":"Residents","Owner":"City planners, building owners"},{"Description":"Lack of natural elements visible from windows in built environments","Impact":"Increased stress and reduced well-being for occupants","Mitigation":"Incorporating natural elements and landscapes visible from building windows","Technologies":"Strategic placement of greenery, landscape design","People":"Office workers, residents","Owner":"Building owners, city planners"}]}
